title: Sanctions compliance certificates
dataVerified: Screened party name, screening date, OFAC/UN sanctions list version, compliance officer name, screening results
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Proves sanctions screening occurred for regulatory compliance. Domain binding verifies screening provider legitimacy. Tamper-evident audit trail for regulators. Prevents backdated compliance certificates. OFAC/EU sanctions compliance critical. Financial institutions must prove screening occurred to avoid penalties. Critical for international transactions where sanctions screening is mandatory.
